lemma ununnecessaryPhis_disjoint_paths: assumes "\<not>unnecessaryPhi g r" "\<not>unnecessaryPhi g s" (* and rs: "phiArg p r" "phiArg p s" "distinct [p, r, s]" *) and rs: "defNode g r \<noteq> defNode g s" and[simp]: "r \<in> allVars g" "s \<in> allVars g" "var g r = V" "var g s = V" obtains n ns m ms where "V \<in> oldDefs g n" "g \<turnstile> n-ns\<rightarrow>defNode g r" and "V \<in> oldDefs g m" "g \<turnstile> m-ms\<rightarrow>defNode g s" and "set ns \<inter> set ms = {}"
